subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: After going down 3-1 in the second period, the Buffalo Sabres, the N.H.L.’s top team, hounded the Rangers until the score was tied, then won in overtime for the fifth time this season.
snippet: After going down 3-1 in the second period, the Buffalo Sabres, the N.H.L.’s top team, hounded the Rangers until the score was tied, then won in overtime for the fifth time this season.
